channel.title: snowwar on Internet Black Hole
channel.description: Recent content in snowwar on Internet Black Hole

item.title: Things have changed a bit
item.description: Some things have changed since last time I been in Warmerise, that is in December 2022. From the beginning, where I was here, this game was in 1000x600px frame. There was menu at the top, chat (removed), description under game (added hmm… about 2 years ago?) and footer with copyright and links. Yesterday I came back here and I see that game fills whole page. I was even surprised that game menu showed quickly.
